Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
AllowAddAccounts_Description: If true, Add New Account button is displayed in Email Accounts area of Settings
AllowAutosaveInDrafts_Description: If true, message being composed is periodically saved to Drafts folder
AllowChangeMailQuotaOnMailServer_Descrip: If true, allows setting email account quota in admin area
AllowDefaultAccountForUser_Description: If true, a user has a default account and its email adress equals user's PublicId
AllowIdentities_Description: Enables using identities on composing mails and managing them in Settings area
OnlyUserEmailsInIdentities_Description: If true, email address cannot be changed when adding or editing an identity
AllowFilters_Description: Enables Filters tab in account settings
AllowForward_Description: Enables Forward tab in account settings
AllowAutoresponder_Description: Enables Autoresponder tab in account settings
EnableAllowBlockLists_Description: Enables the feature of allow/block lists (requires advanced maiserver configuration to work)
DefaultSpamScore_Description: Default value for per-user spam score
ConvertSpamScoreToSpamLevel_Description: Enables converting spamscore to spamlevel for per-user spam settings
SieveSpamRuleCondition_Description: Defines rule for moving mails to spam, used within per-user spam settings
AllowInsertImage_Description: Enables toolbar button for inserting an image when editing message text
AlwaysShowImagesInMessage_Description: If true, external images are always displayed when viewing email messages
AutoSaveIntervalSeconds_Description: Defines interval for saving messages to Drafts periodically, in seconds
AllowTemplateFolders_Description: Allows for setting a folder as template one under Manage Folders screen
AllowInsertTemplateOnCompose_Description: If true, a tool for inserting a template is added on message compose screen
MaxTemplatesCountOnCompose_Description: A limit of number of email templates available for selecting on message compose screen
AllowAlwaysRefreshFolders_Description: If true, each folder in Manage Folders screen gets an option whether it should
DisplayInlineCss_Description: If true, CSS of a message will be converted to inline one when displaying message
CleanupOutputBeforeDownload_Description: Ð’iscard any data in the output buffer if possible, prior to downloading attachment
IgnoreImapSubscription_Description: If true, all the email folders can be accessed, regardless of their IMAP subscription status; also, a tool for hiding/showing folder is removed from Manage Folders screen
ImageUploadSizeLimit_Description: Sets a limit of image file size for upload, or 0 for unlimited
SaveRepliesToCurrFolder_Description: Defines a default behavior for saving replies to the original folder of the message, can be changed in user settings
SieveGeneralPassword_Description: Defines ManageSieve access password if it's required by the agent
SieveFileName_Description: Defines default filename of Sieve rules file
SieveFiltersFolderCharset_Description: Defines charset used in Sieve rules files
OverriddenSieveHost_Description: If set, this value will be used as ManageSieve host - by default, IMAP host value is used for this
SievePort_Description: Defines port number for accessing ManageSieve agent
UseBodyStructuresForHasAttachmentsSearch: If true, attempts to use IMAP bodystructure to perform search for messages that have attachments
UseDateFromHeaders_Description: If true, date and time information for displaying a message is obtained from message headers, not from IMAP envelopes
XMailerValue_Description: If set, defines a value for X-Mailer header added to messages sent out
ForwardedFlagName_Description: Defines a flag used to show message as Forwarded one
PreferStarttls_Description: If true, STARTTLS will automatically be used if mail server advertises its support
ExternalHostNameOfLocalImap_Description: Default external hostname for IMAP server, used by autodiscover
ExternalHostNameOfLocalSmtp_Description: Default external hostname for SMTP server, used by autodiscover
AutocreateMailAccountOnNewUserFirstLogin: If true, a new account will be created in the database on first successful login
SieveUseStarttls_Description: If true, STARTTLS will automatically be used to communicate to Sieve server
DisableStarttlsForLocalhost_Description: If true, STARTTLS will not be used for a local mailserver
XOriginatingIPHeaderName_Description: If set, defines a name of header included into outgoing mail, header's value is IP address of the sender
DoImapLoginOnAccountCreate_Description: If true, logging onto IMAP will be performed when adding a new account in adminpanel
MessagesSortBy_Description: Defines a set of rules for sorting mail
CreateHtmlLinksFromTextLinksInDOM_Descri: If set to true, address@domain texts are replaced with links in HTML; in plaintext, they're always shown as links
SieveCheckScript_Description: If set, CHECKSCRIPT will be run prior to applying Sieve file changes
ExpiredLinkLifetimeMinutes_Description: Lifetime of link expiration. Reserved for use by alternative frontend clients
UseIdentityEmailAsSmtpMailFrom_Descripti: If true, email address of the identity will be used in MAIL FROM command to SMTP server, instead of main email address of the account
